GooCanvas

GooCanvas is a canvas widget for GTK+ that uses the cairo 2D library
for drawing.

Homepage: https://live.gnome.org/GooCanvas

Copyright: Copyright 2005-6 Damon Chaplin.
           Copyright 2001 Sun Microsystems Inc.
           Copyright 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000 Free Software Foundation

 .

Version: 0.15

Note: To import a newer version it is necessary to run ./configure and
 import the file config.h as well.
